data.title: Michael P. Sullivan III
data.meta_description: Currently Michael Sullivan III is Peak’s CFO and is responsible for the overall financial, accounting and workflow operations at Peak.  He provides all required Peak financial interface and documentation for insurance, surety, banks, and title companies as well as state and federal regulatory agencies and Peak licensing.  Additionally, he provides analytical support to both internal
data.text:
Currently Michael Sullivan III is Peak’s CFO and is responsible for the overall financial, accounting and workflow operations at Peak. He provides all required Peak financial interface and documentation for insurance, surety, banks, and title companies as well as state and federal regulatory agencies and Peak licensing. Additionally, he provides analytical support to both internal and external IT decisions and implementation.

Expertise Michael has overseen construction activity exceeding $500,000,000 in a financial management role. Michael’s focus on operational excellence and disciplined execution has enabled him to bring significant operating gains to Peak.
